before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"612ut","text":"Note: High quality isolated Influenza A RNA must be used for this protocol as it is essential for successful complete genome amplification. There are many options for RNA purification, including solid phase reversible immobilization methods (e.g. spin columns, paramagnetic beads), and Trizol derivatives. Freshly isolated RNA with minimal or no freeze thaw cycles typically ensures the highest success rates for complete genome amplification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"cti6d","text":"This integrated indexing RT-PCR protocol has been optimized for whole genome sequencing of influenza A virus (IAV) using Oxford Nanopore’s Ligation Sequencing Kit V14. The updated protocol is an optimization of an early approach used across several laboratories for research purposes, and uses New England Biolabs reagent sets including LunaScript‱ Multiplex One-Step RT-PCR (#E1555), NEBNext dA-Tailing Module (E6053), and the NEBNext Quick Ligation Module (E6056). Previously demonstrated IAV whole genome sequencing approaches for Oxford Nanopore used Superscript III/Platinum Taq RT-PCR reagents input into the Native Indexing reagent set, which results in a complex, multi-step process that requires more than a full working day to carry out. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":214,"length":14},{"key":1,"offset":347,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e3gee","text":" ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3nlh6","text":"The improved integrated indexing protocol can be completed within a working day, and incorporation of the molecular index during first-strand cDNA synthesis in the RT-PCR step reduces the likelihood of sample cross-contamination during handling.  Recent improvements to the approach additionally include Oxford Nanopore defined constant regions that are required for full compatibility with default informatics packages. This update now enables native demultiplexing within either Guppy or Dorado, effectively serving as a “molecular patch” where previous implementations required software modifications that were often broken by silent updates to MinKNOW.   ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b75i8","text":" ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7gmi","text":"As designed, this protocol has potential for extension to other viruses of interest by modifying primer sets. A simplified excel workbook is provided for design of new primer sets, for which the first worksheet requires input of gene-specific primer sets, the second worksheet provides fully constructed primers, and the third can be exported directly for submission to a primer synthesis vendor such as IDT DNA.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"3641E67BAE3611EE9FCF0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/influenza-whole-genome-sequencing-with-integrated-kxygxm7yzl8j"}},"1":{"type":"emoji","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"660FC4F9AE3611EE9FCF0A58A9FEAC02","name":":registered:"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2noeo","text":"Quantify unpurified PCR product using Qubit High Sensitivity DNA reagents","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4sgkb","text":"Pool indexed PCR products together by equal mass into a single tube for purification\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7nj0a","text":"Add .6 volumes of AMPure XP to the pooled iiRT-PCR product and mix by finger flicking","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"13gah","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8ol75","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ghg2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"37nqj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2av5e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7qhmq","text":"Example: 60uL AMPure per 100uL pooled library","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5pfi0","text":"Incubate for    at room temperature or if available incubate on hula mixer at low speeds or IKA plate shaker at 500 RPM","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bdi1u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"44v85","text":"Move to magnetic stand to separate beads, allowing them to sit until solution clears","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8df4v","text":"Remove and discard supernatant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"duvqf","text":"Add    of freshly made 80% ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8n8rp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b31pl","text":"Remove tube from magnet and finger flick","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"33g9p","text":"Repeat steps 8-11 for a total of two washes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1hnee","text":"Allow to dry for    or until bead pellet is no longer shiny","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"452h1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6k7f5","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9to2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fb3l2","text":"Do not over dry! Pellet will be matte, but will not have cracked.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dgrjq","text":"Add    nuclease-free water and resuspend with gentle pipetting. Incubate for   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":77,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ajova","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bpir7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dakq6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4blft","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"31","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"elik9","text":"This 10 minute elution duration is longer than normal Ampure XP, and is intended to maximize the release of larger PCR products.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
